document.full_text: japanese officials and environmentalists traded blame wednesday as nations failed to reach a deal to curb whale hunts by japan, norway and icelandcountries that kill hundreds of whales every year.
document.title: nations fail to agree on curbing japan whale hunt
lines_and_colors: japanese officials and environmentalists traded blame wednesday as nations failed to reach a deal to curb whale hunts by japan, norway and icelandcountries that kill hundreds of whales every year.
